overview: Gary Kraemer brings a strong background in developing and directing financial, operational, and administrative functions in public and private corporations with finance expertise spanning the domestic and international financial markets. Most recently a senior executive with Moldflow Corporation, he had the responsibility for business development activities including managing the $300 million sale of the company to Autodesk, a NASDAQ-listed computer aided engineering software provider. Prior, Mr. Kraemer was CFO at sentitO Networks, a venture-backed telecom equipment provider, where he raised more than $18 million in equity and debt funding and directed the sale of the company to Verso Technologies. He has also held CFO positions with Tira Wireless, Sandburst, and Bowstreet where he led efforts to raise more than $200 million in venture capital and debt funding while playing key roles in guiding the companies through dynamic, high growth, as well as difficult market environments. He honed his expertise in various senior financial positions for Bay Networks/Wellfleet Communications until its acquisition by Nortel Networks and at Data General. Mr. Kraemer began his career as a CPA for Price Waterhouse and holds a Master of Business Administration from Rider University and a Bachelor of Science from Susquehanna University.
